sourcesContent: import { AppBar, Toolbar, Button, Box, Typography } from '@mui/material' import Logo from '../assets/logo.png' const Navbar = () => { const scrollTo = (id) => { document.getElementById(id)?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } return ( {/* Logo + Subtitle */} Connecting Greek youth with Erasmus+ opportunities {/* Navigation Buttons */} ) } export default Navbar
